root.name: DoDonPachi Maximum
root.description: OverviewDescribing itself as a "Maximum Bullet Simulator". DoDonPachi Maximum is a bullet hell shoot 'em up developed by Cave for Windows Phone. It was released on March 7, 2012 and features sprites and remixed music from Dodonpachi Resurrection and Dodonpachi Daioujou. The game also has variable stages catering to both beginners and more experienced players. An iOS version was released on October 26, 2012. This version features new modes and a brand new story which will be added to the Windows Phone release as an update.
